Home
====

Our community website was developed to serve as an informative resource for both our neighborhood and our local community. Please feel free to [contact us](https://www.briarclifftx.com/contact-us/) with your comments and suggestions.

*Photos courtesy of [Christine Prater of Moreland Properties](http://www.christineprater.com/)*

*and the [Lighthouse Restaurant](https://thelighthouseonthelake.com/)*

### Neighborhood News

Pedernales Fire Department

Posted on Jan 8th, 2026

Below is an updated attachment from the Pedernales Fire Department of questions and answers regarding the potential merger with ESD 6. The attachment also includes multiple ways of contacting them if you have additional questions or concerns.

**[HOT TOPICS Pedernales FD](https://www.briarclifftx.com/editor_upload/File/PFD-Flyer-Updated%20121925.pdf)**

New Restrictions and Enforcement for Motorized Devices in Briarcliff’s Park, Trails and Lochs

Posted on Jan 1st, 2026

Beginning **January 1, 2026**, the Travis County Constable’s Office will issue citations for prohibited motorized devices in Briarcliff’s parks, trails and lochs. [**Read more**](https://www.briarclifftx.com/editor_upload/File/BPOA%20Documents/New%20Restrictions%20and%20Enforcement%20for%20Motorized%20Devices%20in%20Briarcliff.pdf).

Updated Stage One Mandatory Outdoor Watering Schedule

Posted on Jul 14th, 2025

The Stage One Mandatory Outdoor watering schedule. This schedule limits automated spray irrigation for landscapes and Hose end sprinkler to the following days:

**ALL CUSTOMERS LIMITED TO 2 DAYS PER WEEK**

* Residential addresses ending in odd numbers: Wednesdays and/or Saturdays
* Residential addresses ending in even numbers: Thursdays and/or Sundays
* Commercial, Multifamily and HOAs: Tuesdays and/or Fridays

Visit our [**Outdoor Watering Schedule.**](https://www.briarclifftx.com/editor_upload/File/WATERING%20stage%201.pdf)

[View Archives](https://www.briarclifftx.com/news-articles/?view=archive)

22801 Briarcliff Drive

512-264-1776

Hours:

Monday-Thursday, 9 a.m. - 4 p.m.
